Module count
Package count.gui.kit

Class SparkLine

java.lang.Object
count.gui.kit.SparkLine
All Implemented Interfaces:
Icon
public class SparkLine
extends Object
implements Icon
A sparkline for displaying the tail of a sequence of values (history).
Author:
csuros

  • Constructor Details

    • SparkLine

      public SparkLine​(int width, int height, int history_length)
      Instantiation with dimensions and history tail length.
      Parameters:
      width - history display width (icon width also includes the spark)
      height -
      history_length - nonnegative; use 0 to include all history
